author: crbooth1957
title: Awesome hospitality
text:
My wife booked the novotel paris bercy for my 60th birthday. Stayed here in june 2016 and staff were great, weather awful.
Didn't get to Nevers as planned as train hit a car on level crossing and we were returned to Paris.
This visit, what can I say, I was overwhelmed, the staff of the novotel were fantastic, kept things secret and when I went into my room.... they new it was my birthday.
To the management and staff of the novotel paris bercy, what a fantastic view to customer service.
On next trip to paris, will only stay at novotel paris bercy
